## Describe it

A clear and short description of the bug.

## Reproduction

How to reproduct it :

1. Open the app
2. Enter 12345
3. A bug occurs

## Expected Behavior

A clear and short description of the expected behavior

## Screenshots

If possible, some screenshots for the cases where the bug occurs.
